system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.qvSNr2XJnvAQCHaF]{Talk Sense} by telling grandiose lies with a straight face, roll +Courage.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They choose one: They cannot do as you ask and will tell you why, or the favor you must do them is expensive, difficult, or demeaning.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: They do as you ask, to the best of their ability.

success.label: Success!
success.value:
They do as you ask, to the best of their ability.

You owe them a favor. The more you ask of them, the more they'll ask of you, and they can cash in at any time - even right now, before they do as you ask.

You may also @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-halfling.Item.0strcFtz26PS9Pl5]{Sting like a Bee}.
